year.description: The year the season ended in. For the current 2023-24 season, the 'Season' is 2024.

coach_since.description: The coach's first season coaching the team.

is_ap_pre_top_5.description: Whether the team was ranked in the top 5 in the AP preseason poll.

is_ap_pre_top_15.description: Whether the team was ranked in the top 15 in the AP preseason poll.

is_ap_pre_top_25.description: Whether the team was ranked in the top 25 in the AP preseason poll.

wins_cur.description: The number of wins the coach has at the current school.

losses_cur.description: The number of losses the coach has at the current school.

games_cur.description: The number of games the coach has coached at the current school.

coach_wl_cur.description: The coach's win-loss percentage at the current school.

wins_car.description: The number of wins the coach has in their career.

losses_car.description: The number of losses the coach has in their career.

games_car.description: The number of games the coach has coached in their career.

coach_wl_car.description: The coach's win-loss percentage in their career.

tourneys_car.description: The number of NCAA tournaments the coach has made in their career.

sw16_car.description: The number of Sweet 16s the coach has made in their career.

ff_car.description: The number of Final Fours the coach has made in their career.

champ_car.description: The number of championships the coach has won in their career.

preseason_pts.description: The number of points the team received in the AP preseason poll.

returning_min_pct.description: The percentage of minutes played by returning players.

returning_score_pct.description: The percentage of points scored by returning players.

g.description: The number of games the team played.

srs.description: A rating that takes into account average point differential and strength of schedule.

opp_pts.description: The number of points given up.

fg.description: The number of field goals made.

fga.description: The number of field goals attempted.

fg3.description: The number of 3-point field goals made.

fg3a.description: The number of 3-point field goals attempted.

ft.description: The number of free throws made.

fta.description: The number of free throws attempted.

team.description: The team name as per sports-reference id.

avg_yr.description: The average year of the players on the team, weighted by playing time.

avg_height.description: The average height of the players on the team, weighted by playing time.

avg_weight.description: The average weight of the players on the team, weighted by playing time.

pi_i.description: Internal ranking system created internally by us -- highly predictive :)

total_games.description: The total number of games played.

avg_points_for.description: The average number of points scored.

avg_points_against.description: The average number of points scored by the opponent.

std_game_margin.description: The standard game margin. The lower the number, the more consistent the team is.

close_wins.description: The number of games won by 3 or less or in overtime.

close_losses.description: The number of games lost by 3 or less or in overtime.

3FGA_pg.description: The number of 3-point field goals attempted per game.

3FGM_pg.description: The number of 3-point field goals made per game.

FTM_pg.description: The number of free throws made per game.

FTA_pg.description: The number of free throws attempted per game.

TOV_pg.description: The number of turnovers per game.

avg_pace.description: The average pace. Roughly how many possessions per game a team has.

off_eff.description: The offensive efficiency. Roughly how many points scored per possession.

def_eff.description: The defensive efficiency. Roughly how many points given up per possession.

pythag_win_pct.description: The pythagorean win percentage. Approximates how many wins a team 'should' have based on points scored and given up.

luck.description: Luck. The difference between actual wins and expected 'Pythagorean' wins.

Seed.description: The seed in the NCAA tournament.

wins_vs_tourney_teams.description: The number of wins against other teams that made the tournament.

away_wins_vs_tourney_teams.description: The number of away wins against other teams that made the tournament.

losses_vs_tourney_teams.description: The number of losses against other teams that made the tournament.

losses_vs_non_tourney_teams.description: The number of losses against non-tournament teams.

games_vs_tourney_teams.description: The number of games against other teams that made the tournament.

prev_net.description: The previous NET ranking before the final one.

net_improvement.description: The NET improvement from the previous ranking to the final one.

pom_improvement.description: The POM improvement from the previous ranking to the final one.
